description: Raindrop MCP Server implementation in dotnet.
name: io.github.g1ddy/raindrop-mcp-dotnet

environment_variables.name: Raindrop:ApiToken
environment_variables.description: Your personal API token from the Raindrop.io developer settings.

environment_variables.name: Raindrop:BaseUrl
environment_variables.description: Optional: Raindrop base URL override for the API.
